oh ok i've come to a decision... my space.com is more my thing so for those of you who like to read my thoughts and our on my space feel free if you not SIGN UP!!!

So ya I think i'm making a new lj i'm just plain bored of this one... it may be awhile but i'll still be sure to comment on y'alls entries kk love ya all farewell to angel03_danni

HAPPY 1 MONTH MATT!!!!!!! 

I love you <3
I love the way you hold me
I love your whisper in my ear
I love your hand in mine
I love the way you offer me hope
I love the way you comfort me
I love your smile
I love your laugh
I love your finger in my hair
I love how you bring the kid out of me
I love how you always have time to spare
I love the faith you have in yourself and us
I love how you care
I love how you chase away all my pain and fear
I love when you say i'm beautiful
I love how you love my flaws
I love how you see me
I love you inside and out
I love you 
baby you're my everything

<3
He knew i missed him so he came down right away. Spend three days with him now. Slept in his arms two nights. God i love him. He sits here and reads this in aw and i can see that we're meant to be. He is going to see if he can stay tommorrow night too because if he does he can be all my peeps at kenners coffee house YAY! i'm so excited!
oh and ps I MUST SAY I HATE THE GORDON BEST!!!! NO DAMN RAMP! now i can't go see remember may during the pure volume tour on feb 10 i'm so mad i complained to the city was i wrong? or should they make it acessible? whats your opinion? i took a stand and i'm proud. the city pisses me off!!!

this is the longest we've been away from each other
a week to be exact
i'm dying here
i miss him terribly
i know he misses me too
i wanna kiss him
 and hold him
god i can't get him off my mind
right now i envy those who have they're loved one so near
and can't bear being away from them for a single day
try a week
this sucks
wish you were here
i miss you so
but i know when i see you
again
i'll love you more then ever before
cause nothing could ever make me stop
loving you
<3

yesterday i was all EMO due to it being the 18th birthday of my dearest friend Jamie... may he rest in peace :< god i miss him

but bye...
to emo...

hello to party... thanks to stef who convinced my dad... finally!!! ...you rock my socks gurl... god i love you <3 p.s dad says i can come again anytime.... your in his good books... pfff we showed him lol

stef's party:

- laughin at krista cut up weed with dull snippers
- stefs and kayts dog is a stoner thanks to ryan (she didn't eat one grape lol)
- laugin at kayt burp as she was on her third of six... she was the life of the party.... gotta love her 
- kayt rubbing ryans face.... thank god thats all she rubbed lol
- me and kayt really "enjoyin" shannon's music
- the organ.... oh god what a headache
- paul and i establishing that staying home is the best thing to do for a living lol ye ye friggin right
- laughin at krista and ryan after there little adventure... do i still look purple krista? lol 
- signing kareokee with kayt even though the mic was broke lol damn that thing eh kayt
- me chugging down like 4 coolers without puking once lol sarah my new nickname is chugger lol thanks kayt for your help....I'M A FUCKIN CHAMP! 
- talking about drunk driving with shannon... i could be arrest you know... no i'm serious
- where'd russell go????
- ryan and the christmas tree in stefs house (at least it wasn't the fan)
- my mysterious phone call..... man my dad trusts stef haaaa haaaa funny shit eh stef
- PAULS ASS SHAKIN lol that was sexy <3
- opps i got sexual with sarah.... i'm a leg toucher... opps sorry matt
- my famous quote bring that shit on mother fckers ye ye
- mmmm those chips were good eh krista and ryan lmao
- me and my i love yous 
- SOMEONE TOUCHIN MY HAIR!

I was so drunk i forgot my jacket i went back and got it costed me 25 bucks tho lol

but good times.... fun ... fun..... I LOVE YOU stef and kayt
 and special thanks to russell and paul without you i may not have conquered those stairs... means alot <3

i must say this weekend was different without matt tho :< i miss my baby and hopeful he rids of all my sins i commited this weekend.... not i wasn't too bad right?? 
god
i wonder what hes doing right now?
i miss him if he was here
i'd kiss him
oh how i miss my love <3
           

but ye i love my girls <3 just as much

I GOT THE BEST NEWS EVER!!!

and no one was online to tell and i'm gonna brust... oh wait Krista was on so she knows what this is all about :-) yay for Krista! but yes no one else knows so i'm very pleased  to say my baby has decided to become a minister... DO YOU WHAT THIS MEANS?? well if you don't i don't want to get all sexual on you so i'll just say it means we now get to take our realationship to the next  level without him commiting sins left and right lol omg its getting hot in here... ya so at first when he told me i felt a tad bit guilty... i don't quite know why but i think i felt bad cause he's like changing his fate for my pleasure... but then he told me that he knew we were always meant to be and therefore expressing his love for me should not be sinful but only consider as an act of god... i mean look at adam and eve lets be next ... i laughed my ass off i don't know if its because it was funny or i was nervous and excited... ah maybe all three lol ... then he was like I WANT to do this... I WANT YOU.... ya i like fainted then of course i told him i wanted it to but i wasn't worried cause he already knew that... i mean come on kinky dee here lol then he was like wait now hold on if you're wondering how mom and dad feel about this(but really i was only thinking about him... oh gee i wonder how he looks in his bday suit... damn its hot in here) mom says this as long as your heart still remains with god and that girl i'm happy  i support you guys 150 %  matt i see you're in love and i know inside god chose her for you... so trust him... the lord wants this  as much as you both do... now go on and get started EXPRESS THAT LOVE!!! (omg if my mom said that to me i'd brust out laughing but ya apparently matt feel a little awkward can you blame him lol) dad says meh oh well then lets talk shall we (and of course we all know what they talked about) so hun it looks like we have all the support we need and soon we'll have eachother... GOD i love him so so so so so very much and thanks to his parents ... omg i love them right now and always of course... omg the anticipation... its excited and nerve racking in a good way of course... in case you all didn't know matt is MY FIRST ppl ya uh big step... but then again i'm his so how special is that but don't worry y'all we ain't rushin it we are waiting for one special monment... oh i can only picture it and trust me its on replay in my mind i couldn't sleep last night... man its gotta be good *winks ... phew its hot ... I CAN not WAIT... but i must and i will only cause hes the only one i want and i love him so... oh i'm like on cloud.. matt has put me on a cloud before but no i don't think i'll come down this time... i like it up here... aw to be in love <3 its grand i must say... god i want him.... i love him so much... maybe i always did... gee took me awhile to clue in lol three years lol... oh well what matters is we found each other and were about to discover each other in ever way wow!!! wow!!!! i believe its a dream come true! matt makes all my dreams come<3 i just hope i do the same ... so ya as i conclude this... just waiting ... i'm excited... i'm nervous ya basically everything all wrapped in to one

AND...

God I LOVE MY MATTIE <3

I wake up to a note on my pillow tuesday morning... ever since then i've been sick... aww my head... anyway i have a long update to write because my net hasn't been working right... and you know what neither has my chair... makes me angry... don't know whats wrong but ya its maddening everything is screwing up and did i also mention i'm sick of this winter shit... i mean ok so sometimes it works toward my advantage.... i got to see matt an extra day cause he wouldn't drive in the shit we got monday :> ya so speaking of him lets get back to that note now shall we:
I hate to say goodbye hun
I didn't want to wake you, god i love watching you sleep
Wish i could hold you just a little longer
Back to the big city... man this sucks
Anyway thanks for everything babe... to new beginnings and lots of love
God i love you
Matt                            

Ya what a great time it was with him... i was treated like a queen really... i mean massages left and right... strawberries and chocolate (fed by him) a toast to us and one very long awaited kiss at 12... ya that was just new years eve... by the way my resolution is to give back what i take.... but ya we also spent time with owen again.... matt was oh so cute with the kid... god i love him.... anyway i made it alot shorter but ya thats my update

ya so major update here.... i got plastered two days in a row with my bro.... major hangover and i'm a crazy drunk lol then when to moms for christmas eve... the whole family was together for christmas all 12 of us... it was awesome.... nice sense of family and lovely family traditions too... the first present i opened on xmas eve was spiderman 2 dvd... gotta love it and ya little brandon lost his first tooth xmas eve... it was wonderful being a witness... he was oh so cute and excited for santa and the fairy in one night... man did i ever enjoy playing the big sis role... dunno it just gives me a chance to be a kid too... we played games and ooo play do god i love it so on xmas up at 5 am... bee and dill jumped on me lol for xmas i got lil things like clohes cds and oh i must say alot of johnny depp and everyone liked my gifts as well... yay it was the best to xmases ever... yay so now drum roll plz... boxing day went to to to see my angel and meet his family and god family... they loved me and i love them... omg chris matts yr old god son was calling me mama d... i melted... awww chris mama d loves you baby and looks like i have another spiderman fan on my hands god i love that boy... right on chris!! ya so turkey 3 times for me... i've had enough... but the best one was with matt's family... they had me say grace with matt... it was beauiful awwww we thanked the lord for each other pretty much when you put all bible talk aside lol <3 then we all went to matt's first sermen which he wrote inspired by our love... i cried.... it was so touching... he had me sitting up front and told his church that i was his angel... ya mmm cried again and his whole church community accepted me in... wow ppl thats big... i'm oh so happy and proud of matt ..... ya so course we went back to his house and were getting all lovey dovey when his mom walked in and decided she would do his washing lol it was funny she was like matt might i remind you... and he was like i know i'm a priest... mom we're not hitting any home runs anything just kissing and she was like homerun huh ohhhhh ya that... no no kissing thats ok good boy... sick to that lol matt was oh so embrassed  but that didn't stop him... thank the lord for that... dunno why but the kisses that night felt like our very first... i'm oh so in love oh ya gifts matt loved my necklace (2 hearts in middle of ctoss represents unity under god) in fact i think he shed a tear or two and showered me with kisses replying with god i love that we are united <3 so do i babe so do i ... my gift was a braclet inspirted with GOD MUST LOVE ME CAUSE YOUR IN MY LIFE AND I CAN'T LIVE WITHOUT YOU <3 it oh god i love him so ya that night we got really tempted and found his oath to god real hard to keep but we were strong and in the end we fall asleep in each other's arms oh so warm and cuddly.... spend time with him was nothing like i imagined it was better but the best part was dinner tuesday... matt took me out... roses wine we had it all... oh so romantic he had me in awe but after my pasta it was my turn... i took his hands looking in to his eyes... oh so dreamy and said matt i'm so very thankful for our friendship and i'm so glad i realized how much you truly cared... when i'm down you pick me up... we can be apart but somehow i still know you're here with me in every way... i've always been scared to love and with you knowing this you gave me your wings then becoming the answer to my prayers... i thank god everyday and now i thank you... baby i love you.... yes that was my FIRST time actually saying i love you to him... we were both crying and then he said god has find me my soulmate hun you always had my heart you know it love you more then i can say... we kissed and said those three words again as if we hadn't said enough... but then shortly after i had to say my goodbye and was on my way back to ptbo :< yesterday gramma came down for dinner and yahzee fun fun... third place here... oh more gifts too damn spoiled or what lol then today kat and i checked out the malls for boxing day sale week... yay for new clothes ya finally up to date sorry for the novel .... oh but i might say happy 8th tommortow to my bro dylan <3 and god i miss matt already

You are 67% Pisces
How much do you match your zodiac sign?
y'all i'm still alive with lots to tell but really busy as soon as i can sit down and write a novel for y'all i will... promise love ya all <3

1. what is the tastiest, most orgasmic food you have ever eaten?

Chocolate subs for any man... anything chocolate.... but mmm o henrys satisify me the fastest lol.

2. what is your favourite band/ singer/ artist?

Band: its a cross between the used or blink 182... they both have awesome music, hot bad ass band members... but mostly its because i can't decide who i wanna bone more Travis or Bert he he

Singer - Glen Messacar - glen's great gotta love him.... I LOVE YOU GLEN!!!! *screams* and isn't the Jesus song the best? lol

3. if you could re-do a movie with you in it, what moive would that be? 

any movie starring <3 Johnny Depp man I could name a few but i'd be here all day.... but ya there are so many dreams i have had regarding this question... aw hell to name a few... i've also wanted my hair cut by Edward Sisscor Hands... or to be his partner in the love scenes for both Chocolat and Blow... or to sword fight in pirates of the carribean(but we all know what sword i really wanna see lol) as for his newest movie Finding Neverland man the sexy thang could stay by my bed side forever... oh he's also soon to be starring in Charile and the Chocolate Factory the remake as Willy Wonka.... man lets just hope i get a golden wrapper... he can be my candy man... damn bet he tastes sweet... ya get me i love JOHNNY DEPP!!!

4. were you named after anyone?

well... i have the same middle name as Grandma McB... its Christine

Finally,

5. what are your veiws on anal sex? 

hey whatever floats your boat... i mean i don't find it gross or anything but never tried it and you know what they say about that you have to give everything i try before you diss it... who knows i'm pretty kinky i might like it up the ass

today was awesome... stef and kayt came by and gave me my gift.... it was a pink... one of my favouite colours.... blink 182 tshirt.... y'all know that i love blink 182... hell i wanna bone travis barker.... hottness <3 but ya i think they're one of the best band out there... so I LOVE THE SHIRT <3 and i love stef and kayt... thank you gals <3 muah and hugs * so ya they stayed... it was so very nice to see them  again... we had quite the vent session.... plotted some evil plans.... oh we're so bad... but stef was so afraid dad was going to walk in... man she would so kick his ass.... too funny gotta love her... we talked about some touchy subjects i almost teared up but i know i can trust them which is awesome... man what awesome friends they are i'm so thankful love them dearly.... andrew kennedy my ex showed at the door while they were here and jay one of my dads buds ... scared the socks off stef... good times they both invited me to a party which i can't wait for... fun fun... oh ya stef also mentioned solomon... gee i wonder how he is doing probably should drop him a line maybe... miss him as a friend... funny kid but today i miss my mattie most... its fuckin cold out and i want him to keep me warm... i miss him bad... oh man i'm extremely nerveous about next weekend and meeting his god family... its important to him and a huge step... dunno usually brave but loves got me spun... man i love him and can't stop thinking about him... wish he was here...

DO THIS: 
1 -- Leave a comment, saying you want to be interviewed.
2 -- I will respond; I'll ask you five questions.
3 -- You'll update your journal with my five questions, and your five answers.
4 -- You'll include this explanation.
5 -- You'll ask other people five questions when they want to be interviewed


Interviewed by Kayt 

You Gotta Love Her--- she's awesome rocks my universe really :> KAYT LOVE YA GURL *muah and hugs* <3

1. Favorite Childhood Memory

ummmmmmm damn this question is hard.... how about when I met Wayne Grezeky the hockey legend at age 10... yup that was sweet... still have a signed hockey puck

2. if you could sleep with anyone in the world who would it be?

I can't choose just one.... you know me kinky dee lol so its foursome time lol and those three lucky men would be... well duh Johnny Depp no doubt about that <3, Bert Mccraken and Travis Barker.... man thats one wild night... can't wait... what do you say girl wanna join in? lol

3. Favorite Animal?
*yawn* Dolphin 


4. Whats the first thing that comes to mind when i say the word "blow"

Me giving a blow job to those three lucky hotties on one wild night *blushes* just kidding i'm an angel... really i am... ummmm *sighs* candles on my bday cake lol

5. if you could be anywhere in the world right now where would you be?
Under my covers all tuckled up in Matt's arms... gotta love him <3 oh how warm that'd be.... i'm fuckin cold here and may the beating of his heart put me to sleep... god i love that boy<3 but ya i'm going to stop now before i make you sick lol

One Eventful Weekend....

 

well friday I headed out to kenner for thier kick ass christmas assembly.... omg everyone was so awesome...Solomon, Shannon, Kev eveyone was beautiful but I might say Sound the Alarm was the best ever... if only i believed in angels is still stuck in my head... holy shit thats an awesome song... wait to go Russell and company!!!! I was pissed about one thing though... for some reason Glen decided to cut his set short... i'm not sure why but i believe it might have been because some peeps were been disrepectful to him and throwing stuff... damn them all... i came out there to see him and i didn't get to... i'm still mad but oh well it was awesome seeing kayt and krista... they hung with me the whole time... gotta love em <3 they got me so hyped lol lets just say glen had his own lil fan club over in the corner.... we love you glen and hey if glen had of sang the jesus song that would have been great eh girls lol Oh and i'll never forget singing she will be loved with kayt lmao the whole day was a blast... kenner rocks! but the best part was when i got home and my baby was waiting for me... it was our week anniversary <3 YAY... I  love you matt. ya so he cooked me dinner... pasta my fav then he came with my bro and I to see the show at the spill... remember may was playin but they had some tech probs so it wasn't as good but they were sweet they let me up front and matt of course and gave me a free demo cd... they are awesome guys it didn't really matter bout the show cause matt and i were making out to much to notice lol it was beautiful... he tastes so sweet( remember he's a man of god danielle stop - this was going throurgh my head all night) ya but seeing the way him and my bro got along was great... omg bonus... ya so the show ended at like 1 am.... but we all went for pizza after and matt and i fed each other we were driving tyler insane.. it was fun and oh so yummy.... ya so got home by 3 and matt and i fell asleep in each others arms... gotta love my angel matt made me brunch in the morn the kid loves to cook.... nothing much went on during the day alot of cuddling and love dovey stuff.... but that tonight we all got drunk at t bones house... matt really had to keep me off of him them... poor kid i guess i'm an even bigger flirt when i'm drunk but ya it  was fun

today my god son Owen came down matt and I babysat... it was cute.... matt said it had him thinking i was like whoa don't think so fast... its only been a week lol not much else is happening we both have huge headaches... ummm i wonder why lol but ya he's cooking me dinner again and we are both once again dreading 8... when he leaves for TO :( i miss him already but god what a weekend

he drives down from toronto in this crappy weather to see you when you are sick.... when he knows how much better you feel when you're in his arms so he just holds you... when he's aware you have the flu but he kisses you anyway... when he does everything in his power to make you well... when he toches you and you are not so sore anymore lol when he dreads that its getting closer to 8 because he has to leave you.... when you too are dreading 8 cause when 8 rolls around you'll miss him so bad and most all when he's sitting here reading this journal and not laughing at how completely corny it is but only turning your head towards his and reminding you why you chose him over anyone... his eyes.... you know he's a keeper when he then says i love you and you find yourself lost in those eyes... so lost that you don't know what to write anymore
.............................................................................

stay tuned for more you know you have a keeper when.......
Brought to you by: Danni

phew all my shoppin' done.... i'm so excited for christmas... i'm off to norwood yayness i'm chillin with the kiddies this year... they are cute as hell around this time of year... so ya busy as hell with all this shoppin... man 20 ppl... wow! but their all going to love what i got i'm sure but ya i love christmas can't wait but really i'm just happy to be happy again and i have already recieved the greatest gift of all... the gift of love... man i can't stop thinkin about matt... he has me floating on a cloud.... hes love it sings to me (see previous entry) man just having someone to count on... wow i thank god... he's so sweet and the faith he has in me its so beautiful... wow i never thought we'd be here but we are... he is the answer to my prayers... my angel... i love him so and he returns these feelings omg how wonderful it feels to say that... wow not a care in the world right now as long as i have him... i don't think about all the shit... just him and he's hottness i'm so happy 
THANK YOU MATT LOVE YA BABE <3

Dedicated to you

you know who you are

Solitude"

How many times have you told me you love her
As many times as I've wanted to tell you the truth
How long have I stood here beside you
I live through you
You looked through me

Ooh, Solitude,
Still with me is only you
Ooh, Solitude,
I can't stay away from you

How many times have I done this to myself
How long will it take before I see
When will this hole in my heart be mended
Who now is left alone but me

Ooh, Solitude,
Forever me and forever you
Ooh, Solitude,
Only you, only true

Everyone leaves me stranded
Forgotten, abandoned, left behind
I can't stay here another night

Your secret admirer
Who could it be

Ooh, Can't you see
All along it was me
How can you be so blind
As to see right through me

And Ooh, Solitude,
Still with me is only you
Ooh, Solitude,
I can't stay away from you

Ooh, Solitude,
Forever me and forever you
Ooh, Solitude,
Only you, only true

friends... really starting to wonder who are really my friends.... i dunno some i haven't talked to or seen in months ya kinda sick of being ignored... thats why i left norwood duh... but hey these peeps seem to think that they can be my friend but only when it benefits them... well whatever... then theres those who are accusing me of lies and backstabbing mean while they are the ones who did it to me... well i don't need them.... then theres the ones who just plainly annoy me with their oh my life is perfect bullshit... mine isn't so back off.... like omg i don't know who to trust right now... what the fuck is trust anyway... like i have lost so many friends this week its sad but hey i don't need them if y'all want to ignore me go ahead. i've survived lonely and i'll continue to. to think the only real friend i had is gone... never to return... god i miss you jamie... damn i ache so bad just to hear his voice right now. RIP. my friends probably all think i'm like all bitchy and shit.... hey if you were working so hard towards walking and then your hip went out never to return to normal... or your mom and dad still argued using u your sis and ur bro as pawns over a divorce of 12 yrs... if your mom suffered from depression and called you a failure and blamed you... if everyone guy you ever loved cheated on you or rejected you... if you were turned down from the college not once but twice... if everynight you lied awake wondering whether your father was going to relaps... if all your dreams went up in flames you'd be pissed to... seriously all my life i have fought... i'm sick of it... why why am i the one to suffer... god no more shit please..... well hey i'm strong i can do this alone... but someone tell me i don't have to... i'm waiting.... ya so my life is shit i hate it .........
but i might say my dad has been a sweetheart... hes trying... maybe theres hope but i'm afraid to get my hopes up... i am sorry... i'm just so confused about it all... i want it all to go away... i want happy so bad.

Fri: Well i'm currently wearing my new red Rides Again t-shirt which I recieve for free from Zac Washburn of Remember May (only because they don't have their own shirts yet) Ya so let's back track a lil first here shall we... So I went the punk show at the trash with tyler, kennedy, andrew, cayla, jenny, jess and kat and andrea(bless their poor souls... turns out my sis and her bud didn't really like it too much... they whined alot it was oh so very annoying... but they stuck it out for me bless their souls <3) So ya standing in the line really sucked it was friggin cold out.... but i ran into russell and shannon that was sweet.... yay for shannon hug. Kim was on her way home from work saw her too :>. ya so my posse and i got to the front of the line and it turns out my chair won't fit in the door (due to a divider) man i was pissed but bless the trash staff... they looked everywhere for a drill... they got one and removed the divider *muah* ya so they show was awesome.... people were pumped(mike fee was shaking his ass in front of my sis lol) Remember May took the stage... and once again bless the trash staff they offered to put me up front. It was the shit... I was so close Zac could spit on me(which he did lol)... <3 ZAC <3 but then my bro and his friends started mosh pittin.... i was right in the middle.... thats right i mosh pitted DAMN!!! ya so back to the tshirt... well zac came up and introduce himself and the rest of the band.... i told them they rocked that i loved them, got a free t shirt and.... A KISS FROM ZAC HIMSELF!!!!!! <3 they rock.... i liked them better then any band there.... except for the cheapsuits they fucked knocked my socks off..... ya so the show ended at around 2 am.... and we ended up waiting twenty five mins out in the fuckin cold for the cab back home that sucked but all in all.... thumbs up!

Sat: Kat and Andrea decided they were going to go to the store... they didn't come back for 4 hrs...  ya a lil freaked but meh it turns out they just walked to McDonalds. Later they night we went and saw finding neverland.... it was very interested yanked a couple tears outta me though. But mmmmmm <3 Depp.... lookin oh so sexy in this movie. omg... the girls laughed all night.... apparently their was a guy sleeping beside them and a farter with stinky feet behind them lol  Good night with yummy dill pickle popcorn. 

Sun: not much here... chilled and rented rasing helen.... good movie and oh i ate a ton of my dads taco salad... yummy

quite the weekend eh wow!

Ok... I'm not a big country fan even tho I was broght up on the music. But sometimes it gets one hope. My mom reminded me of three songs the river, standing outside the fire and unanswered prayers. There all by garth brooks. But they used to give me so much hope so here i am listening to them now..... and i feel a ton better. 

 The River"

You know a dream is like a river
Ever changin' as it flows
And a dreamer's just a vessel
That must follow where it goes
Trying to learn from what's behind you
And never knowing what's in store
Makes each day a constant battle
Just to stay between the shores...and

I will sail my vessel
'Til the river runs dry
Like a bird upon the wind
These waters are my sky
I'll never reach my destination
If I never try
So I will sail my vessel
'Til the river runs dry

Too many times we stand aside
And let the waters slip away
'Til what we put off 'til tomorrow
Has now become today
So don't you sit upon the shoreline
And say you're satisfied
Choose to chance the rapids
And dare to dance the tide...yes

I will sail my vessel
'Til the river runs dry
Like a bird upon the wind
These waters are my sky
I'll never reach my destination
If I never try
So I will sail my vessel
'Til the river runs dry

There's bound to be rough waters
And I know I'll take some falls
But with the good Lord as my captain
I can make it through them all...yes

I will sail my vessel
'Til the river runs dry
Like a bird upon the wind
These waters are my sky
I'll never reach my destination
If I never try
So I will sail my vessel
'Til the river runs dry

Yes, I will sail my vessel
'Til the river runs dry
'Til the river runs dry


We call them cool 
Those hearts that have no scars to show 
The ones that never do let go 
And risk the tables being turned 

We call them fools 
Who have to dance within the flame 
Who chance the sorrow and the shame 
That always comes with getting burned 

But you've got to be tough when consumed by desire 
'Cause it's not enough just to stand outside the fire 

We call them strong 
Those who can face this world alone 
Who seem to get by on their own 
Those who will never take the fall 

We call them weak 
Who are unable to resist 
The slightest chance love might exist 
And for that forsake it all 

They're so hell-bent on giving ,walking a wire 
Convinced it's not living if you stand outside the fire 

Standing outside the fire 
Standing outside the fire

"Unanswered Prayers"

Just the other night at a hometown football game 
My wife and I ran into my old high school flame 
And as I introduced them the past came back to me 
And I couldn't help but think of the way things used to be 

She was the one that I'd wanted for all times

For the gifts in my life

Some of God's greatest gifts are unanswered prayers 

Some of God's greatest gifts are all too often unanswered...

The snow is falling for this first time this year. And even tho I hate it I can't help but love it....
I look out the window as the flakes fall so peacefully and I can't help but feel this innocence as if i was a child again. But I feel so cold and lonely as well and wish you were here to act as my warmth. My heart beats with hoilday cheer already... i just wish on every snowflake i could share it with you. I wonder what my baby bros are doning right now. They'd be oh so excited. I miss them so and i'm missing so many traditions... i get to spend hoildays with them but it ain't the same. Sad. But maybe this winter will be the kinda winter wonderland i wish for with my very own jack frost.

last night my bro tyler, andrew, kennedy, cayla, jenni corey and i went to the spill. the show was fuckin awesome.... remember may rocks. it pays to  have a bro who knew them because i got a seat up close... it was the best... and their bassist, i believe his name was zach was so very sexi.... whats with me and bassists lol but ya when zach was done his performance he kept coming up and talking to me... i almost fainted... he was on fire. anyway thier songs were sweet and they covered taking back sunday and finch... which i love... i'm so punk... ya it was awesome. but the band that followed them kinda sucked but i'm totally going to see remember may on the 26th at the trash. everyone was having a good old time... jumpin around and stuff... ya some asshole fell on me he tripped on my chair... lol but it was all good i just laughed but thank god i wasn't hurt. ya so all in all the night was good we all went for pizza afterward... yum. ya tyler i love being punk with you you rock... love ya lil bro. it was so fuckin cold outside... holy shit tyler and i got to the show a lil early so we walked around a bit and met up with andrew... i was so cold but he offered hes jacket so i took it of course. he was the sweetest thing to me all night. but ya it was all good but no concerts for me for a while... i've totally lost my voice... screamin fan lol ya kat is sick she not coming down this weekend so i think i'll just chill and take it easy today.

Last night I went to the coffee house at Kenner. it was a total blast and everything looked amazing... thanks to my girl shannon the atmosphere was so very mellow and cheery. Ya so I got there kinda early like by an hour but my dad had to leave for work so i took the first chance i got for a ride... i wouldn't miss it for the world. so ya i was excepting glen to meet me out front like he said he would after all i was truly there cause i was invited by him but he didn't show... no biggy i found my way and shannon was there to greet me with the best hug ever... it was greatly needed... shannon girl i love you. then I believe that russell was the next to greet me... so very nice. I felt so special cause i got to watch all the preshow stuff... i couldn't stop laughing at glen who was being hes foolish self. ya but then sarakins and amber showed and i was so surprised to see them... sarakins and i did some catching up... she was oh so nervous about her comedy act but i told her to do it for moi and she did it was fuckin funny. everyones performances were wonderfully done but i was completely blown away once again by messacar... he rocks my world what can i say i'm his number 1 fan. he played my two favs like he promised.. sad song and fade away. his cover was ten thousand times better and he looked sexier then noel ever will. anyway i think anyone could see i was a devoted fan. i thank him for awknowledging it too he said that it was worth clapping for cause i left them all last year but was still devoted to kenner... then on impluse i yelled out ya kenner rocks mother fuckers... it was awesome. ya i never  realized how much of an oasis fan i was but it was played about 8 or more times last night and i sang along to every one... no shit except for shannon's cover of wonderwall because i was wowed... it was beauiful and so moving that i cried... but i cheered for her after it was done... followed by a huge i love  you shannon. I was also very glad that kate solomon got up to perform with erin... she said she wasn't going to i was like hell ya you are and she did it for me in cowboy hat and all. i got to wear that hat later on in the night... man i love pb... the poor kid left her jacket on my chair and i went home with it... i freaked her... sorry kate the coat still sits nicely on my couch... she shall come get it soon she said lol every one rocked and i love them all so very much... i mean they don't have to include me but they do.... thanks my friends for a blast last night. i'll always be a devoted fan to all of you... but messacar is my number 1 lol

omg i'm so hyper... i've been dancing and singing all day. i haven't a clue why... so much energy. I was so down now there's this overcome of happiness... wow this is awesome but why... is it because i hung out with toni, holly and zee last night. man... those gurls always know when i need them. It was nice just to gossip and hug and cry... like a bunch of gurly girls lol so ya this morning i just awoke in a good mood... long awaited. is it because i'm excited to rock the house... the coffee house that is with all my kcvi hommies... omg so fun tommorrow night... love and miss them bunches and man i need them all so much right now. i haven't been out in awhile due to my health omg so very glad my life is on track again. i'm so happy... and feel like i'm floating... meh thats probably cause of he who can not be named quite yet lol i can't get him outta my head... omg i'm fallin again... nuttin new right lol my sister kat is coming down friday for the weekend.. i'll see her after the big event... coffee house... duh. the girl really needs your big sis right now self-esteem probs but anyway i'll probably cry when i tell her that i wish i could take her pain away... i would go to hell and back for her... love ya sis. pain sucks but i'm all good at least emotionally but thats the kinda hurt that makes me weak. bad health is nothing... bring it bitch lol just let me smile awhile first... ok... omg i love this mood

my life is so unblanced and unpredictable. like I was sick all week last week... fuck lets just not talk about my health cause these days when i'm not sick i'm in complete pain due to my hip. My iron level rasies and falls... i'm fed up.. things are messed... my friends or some of them are pushing me away... my dad and his drunkin hate... i'm so damn lonely... living in the shadows longing for some one to say i love you. sorry i'm just not me... dunno why... but i do know i hate this... i want to be me again. but i'm not very strong right now just useless. I fuckin hate waking up every day... wandering what crap is in store for me. i'm an emotional wreck .... one day gloomy as hell the next ok but i haven't be totally happy in a while. i feel like all my smiles are fake and i'm putting on a show. the question maybe has arose alot... like maybe no pain today or maybe you'll say you care today. but i'm sick of maybe so uncertian... i feel like running for it all... i feel like i'm letting everyone down but do they care. right now when i need support i'm not getting it. i mean they all say they care but words aren't everything. help... i'm messed... no i don't want this for myself. where's the old me?

I have to say I was quite nervous to go to moms this weekend but I did and I'm glad. It was different tho... a little awkward. At times I felt outta place... like when mom made comments like we're sorry this place just isn't fully accessible anymore or when jim my step dad ignored me like I was a piece of shit... ya thats right he didn't say a word to me... not even hello! Mom says thats just him he holds grudges and i know shes right so meh its his lost. Everyone else was fine with me... tyler came with me oh ya and he just had to invite andrew... that was awkward too. lol, tyler introduced him to mom and jim as my ex of all things.... pfff thanks tyler. Ya so didn't do much... just alot of cacthing up. OMG the house is being renovated so it was a mess reaaly. Dylan and Brandon brought out the kid in me while watichin treehouse, having shaving cream fights and playing uno cards (I Won!!) Lil brandon was following me around all weekend... and i gave him rides on my quote on quote hot wheel lol I love that kid.... so cute... i got him addicted to saying wicked.... its fuckin funny... hes six... imagine this...

B: mom whats for supper?
M: chicken hun
B: wicked!
it was funny.

OMG it was the first time ive seen Ryan (step bro) in like seven years. HES 20! hes a man and a pretty good lookin one at that.... yes i told him that. Kat accused me of hittin on him... e wwww i was not hes my step bro blah... totally gross. Kat is nuts... thank god ryan saved me and said i was just commenting its ok. hes awesome.... we were play wrestling and shit and between you and i he gave tyler some stuff (beer and pot) for the party last night. Oh and i got to meet crystal hes gf.... shes my age.. we have a ton in common... ITS AWESOME! sean, chantelles bf is wicked too. I fed Chantelle's horse... you all know i'm a horse lover. hows kat you ask shes cool... going through a hard time with her circle of friends they are caling her a slut... seriously how low is that.. so ya we had a heart to heart... i told her i'd gladly kick those bitches asses lol and we cried together... it was emotional but nice to have my sis there. I took dylan and brandon trick or treating.... they were cute my two little power rangers ya so all in all my weekend was awesome even though i didn't party hard i got a sense of family.... which was needed badly. THANKS GUYS!!! <3 oh but i'm not so thankful for one thing... dylan was sick and guess who he passed it on too... tyler and I! damn today i feel like shit but meh i was healthy for a day... A DAY!!! i hate been sick..and tired as hell. hope to get well soon.

well i went to the doctors to found out why i was passing out yesterday and my fuckin iron level is low... then one of my health care workers dropped me... she dropped me! right on my back... fuck it hurt ummm ya hello rod in back... fuck its sad that i rely on peeps that drop me... damn it. my bro had to lift me off the ground. the pain was and still is horrible... i want to kick her ass!! FUCK!!! why such luck? but meh turns out i do get to go to moms after all... so maybe just maybe a smile will appear. PLEASE GOD!!!!! what i'd give for happiness again!!!

ok last night i passed out dunno why and today i feel weak as hell... fuck as if my health couldn't get worse... i mean my hip is still dislocated. thats not enough though my van broke down again... which means i can't visit mom again this weekend she s goes back to kingston next week... this was my only chance and fuck. my dads sober streak...  gone... which means i'm a failure again .... what an asshole. oh and did i mention i'm lonely as hell... sick of my life. everything is wrong and i hate this weather. man it sucks... whats the price to pay for glory?

omg its been awhile... a week! nothing much has been happening although s'all good. So ya Monday I found out that Carl is going to be fine but he's on oxygen so his parents have decided to put him in a home in the big T.0 i don't know what to think of that... i mean its good but sad all the same.  I'll miss him so. Tuesday and Wenesday not much happenend I signed up for this chat for the disabled... it is so cool to meet new peeps and to have peeps to talk to who understand what its like being in my shoes. they all are cool peeps but i'm really cli cking with this guy named Dan who has a form of cp as well. omg we have everything in common... i mean like i could be a female version of him. hes really awesome and from peterborough. We exchanged pics... apparently he thinks mine are pretty hot.... between you and i hes pretty damn sexy as well but i never told him that... i don't know this whole thing is strangely weird for me.. i mean its good but i have never had a disabled person hit on me before let alone hit on one myself but hey theres a first for everything.  Thrusday I had a breakdown cause my five year old bro brandon called me and was like miss ya dee come play wit me peas.... battafly kisses and teddy bear hugs god i miss that kid so bad i miss everyone. so ya my dad fixed my van so i could go now for the weekend but mom made an excuse again at the last min and i didn't go. saturday dad and i went to timmys for a coffee then we went to the market. things are a lil better with him(sober for nine days!!!)i got stuck babysitting jenna again (andrews sister) that kid loves me but she asked why i didn't love andy anymore ya that was awkward i was like i love him bunches hun don't you worry then she said i scared her because she thought i was never coming back to play barbies with her again it was cute as hell but killed me. I went to my bros band prac. and of course andrew was there.... i told him what jenna said he was like even my sister wants us back together.. oh god i don't know where were at these days sunday the whole gang was down it was fun but all my home girls were asking about..... guess who
 


so ya did i meantion this weather sucks... it causes me pain.... come on spring!!!!
but sall good

well feeling a bit better today... went shopping. last night my dad came home drunk again and verbrally abused me so bad... i cried and what i did he yelled in my face... go ahead cry fucker... man what's wrong my world is messed up. i've cried so much lately i have no more tears to cry. I mean no where to turn... but as usual when i need someone andrew was there. i couldn't talk to anyone... i didn't want to... so he just held me... it was weird. I mean we are nothing... then he said he loved me... but i'm confused what is love my dad said that to me once and now this... does it mean anything... i dont know if i can say those words again. everyone i love... i lose. But lately i've lost myself... i can't sleep or eat i feel sick inside, but in his arms i felt safe like no words could hurt me anymore. I wanted to stay there... he stayed to watch tv there was a point where i looked back and he was sleeping on my bed and i thought to myself.. if only i could have peace like that again.. if things were normal again... anyway the s'morning my dad laughed it off and i cried... nothing is changing... i'm sick for real today puking and shit i think its stress no fuckin doubt

I'm sick of watching him always turn to the bottle and his stupid drugs.... can't he see its hurting us both. He staggered in drunk again last night... he won't tell me what's wrong he just fuckin drinks it away. Last night he call me a failure and said he was depressed since my birth and all this resentful shit. I yelled at him for the first time ever telling him i hated him for this shit... every fuckin night i'd gladly move back to Mom's but for what to be shit on again.... oh ya i didn't know this but apparently i'm the reason why my mom now suffers of depression and i will be just like her... a shelfish bitch. I'm regreting coming to live here but i had no fucking choice... no one to turn to.... its the same now... i can't get out of this hell hole. ty says he doesn't mean this and i need to talk to him but when can i hes never sober anymore...  it hurts inside. And the thing is he'll laugh it off l ike nothing happended no i'm sorry... or i love you. I used to do the same but why should i have to so i can deal with the same shit again tommorrow.. what good is that. Wheatever... i make myself sick  thinkin about him now... asshole how could he say that to me i'm so angry but everything is a joke to him. OMG i think i understand why my mom left him... fuck wish i could... man my family is fucked up... what's it like comin from a stable family as i cry ... i ask myself that. fuck i'm so sad... this whole thing makes my stomach turn.... fuck... go away... i keep wishing but it doesn't fuckin help. man i'm sick of this shit... my own father makes me sick... thats fuckin maddening!

Well this was my first thanksgiving weekend at my father's ever... it was different but good. My dad had the weekend off work which was nice.... very awesome! and although the weekend didn't go quite as planned... we had each other. I mean Kat was suppose to come down but she stayed home for the Norwood Fair. On friday night Dad and I went out drinking at the Vibe... it was a blast and I got real drunk... we came home at two am and blasted the tunes and paried it up but come saturday I was very tired... so sat was kinda boring... I just chilled with andrew and tyler. Ty kept leaving us two alone as if to say he wanted sparks to fly between us... well pff there ain't no fire burning anymore. But Andrew is trying still he got my a necklace was a gift to say he was thankful to have our friendship. He stayed for our 1st turkey dinner... which was quite yummy i might add. Yesterday was my Mommy's 41st birthday... happy b day mom... we were suppose to have some mother daughter time today.... chapters then a movie and dinner but i phoned her yesterday and she was feeling sick on her b day man that bites. so i think we're hanging next weekend. Tonight is our second turkey dinner Gramma is coming down to play some bingo and yahtzee ( lets hope I won baby), singin with my dad and crazy uncles is always fun (no bob dylan please i beg you) and oh i get to see my baby 2nd cuz gracie for the first time. I LOVE BABIES... AND GRAMMA'S PIES LOL. all is good and although i do miss thanksgivin at moms.... i'm happy and thankful for this time i have spent with friends and family!

Happy Thanksgiving,
Danni

I'm so tired this morning... I couldn't sleep last night.... Last night really sucked. Oh ok so ya I found that my friend Carl with MD is in the hospital. His immune system is low and he has lung problems because he has MD he won't be able to fight it off much longer. I'm so upset... like Jamie his seventeen year old bro just died a month and a half ago. I know these kids from camp... we were close friends and Carl goes to Kenner as well. Oh my god when Jamie died I lost myself... I can't lose Carl too. Why God why are you doing this... I am so worried for Carl... it kills me inside to know that I can't help him get better. I cried myself to sleep after praying for Carl. I couldn't sleep... I woke up a billion times.... crying. OH and did I mention my bro is really stupid at 8 at night he told me him and a friend were going to jump off the back of a moving train... I said what the fuck you'll kill yourself but he didn't listen .... so in the middle of the night I woke up cause I got this chill down my spine like someone had walked over my grave... i just knew something was wrong. Just then at two am Kennedy's father knoked at the door... nervous as hell... wondering where his son was. My dad told me that Tyler wasn't home yet ethier. They went out looking for them while I laid it bed thinking the worse... shaken and crying. I mean Tyler means the world to me if anything happens to him i'd... I never realized how much I care about him until a point where he wasn't safe. Man, I was freaked I needed someone there to hold me and tell me everything was going to be fine... I thought of my mom and then of Jim and then of Andrew and then of Glen... I just wanted to feel secure. It was long before my dad came back saying he couldn't find Tyler.... I screamed and cried and cried. At 5 am my bro came walking in... I was like oh thank god you're ok I was  worried sick don't do a stupid thing like that again. He came over to my bed... saw a tear in my eye and hugged me and said its ok I'm fine... he held me a while and I felt secure... man i love my lil bro... so I said it and he said Love ya and don't worry I'll never leave.. that was the nicest thing he's ever said to me. I think he saw how strong our love really is and as he tucked me in that night I knew my bro was always there for me. What a feeling... but in general i was so relieved that one of the worse nights of my life was over.

Sleepy,
Danni

Nothing new really... last night was fun! I hung with my bro and the guys (Tbone, Brandon, Neil, Zac) I was in guy heaven.... they are pretty fine but the only thing is there all so young... not Brandon though hes 18 and the hottest of them all... ya so of course I was my normal self... all firty and shit. But man it was fun... my bro and my baby tbone did the regular and sung so Blink, we bugged our neighbour Mr. Booth at 11 30 at night... man he was going to call the cops on us... pff for singing to loud please that old grump. LMAO!! we were such complete jackasses last night... doing burn outs on my kitchen floor was fun and oh ya i got dared to make out with brandon... NO PROB!! he tasted pretty damn good but Tbone was jealous and started yellin at me... Ty told him to chill... that i wasn't his girl anymore(thank god). Well Tbone didn't like it mu ch and fists flew... my bro kicked his ass... man i love him. I was laughing my ass off the whole time. It's the first time in a while i forgot all of my stress and had fun. T bone lightened up and all was mellow... i mean we were just kids having fun but thank god dad wasn't home cause we're bad asses.. my dad would kill me and Ty but meh... i forgot about him, Glen and my dislocted joints all was good and all is good. S'all good as I sit here writing this entry... time stands still and all is mellow.. how nice!! Tonight i'm hangin with Toni(I think)... shall be fun. Oh I would like to say congrats to Kenner for rasing 15 000 for Terry Fox those guys rock! I love them and they know it... i miss them bad but...
MEH,
Danni

Not much here...I'm sick and hurting... inside and out. My back fuckin kills me... oh god i'm so scared. SWEET SHIT! I have been watching the Oasis videos he told me to download... i have established that NOEL IS FUCKIN HOT!!... and Glen is my wonderwall as my friend he is always there to save me and ya ya there are so many things i would like to say to him but i don't know how. Obvivous yet! Oh as if thats not enough i dreamt about him last night i dreamt that we ummmmmm in the rain... hey it rained on saturday ok... Danni

It's been a while since I last wrote... what's been happening... ALOT!!!! Where to start.... Well, things are good at work...Very good!!! I have really been getting along with my co worker Ian. What can I say about Ian? He's 21, funny as hell, very ambitious and so much more. OK he's sexy... i mean come on james van der beek look alike... and get this his last name is Dawson LMAO! I really enjoy working with him.... sometimes he can be quite a distraction tho (hottness). Great friends we have became and we have great convos at work... usually i'm shy around guys but not him.... maybe its because he has a form of cerebral pasly as well(although not in a chair) i still feel that some how he knows what i'm going through. I finally asked if he was single .... he said yes...OMG! that sexy thing single so then he asked if I was and Andrew came to my mind... it took alot but I was like yup and proud of it. Then he asked if I looking to be in a realationship... i felt so stupid when I said ummmmm i don't know but then he broke the ice and said i'm just waiting for the right person. Every since then he has been flirting with me like crazy... i'm a hottie lol. He sends me emails at work and i send them back we are so naughty...the boss might catch us. But the things he says are so sweet and I don't have a problem flirting back of course not. I try to stay on task but my eyes are continously drawn to him as he continues to comment on my eyes himself followed by sexy or babe. On thursday, he asked for my number... omg I never had a guy want me so bad.... i mean i was always the one chasing the guys. Thrusday at work was great!!! he asked me out to dinner on friday. IAN: danni you know what I would love? Me: What's that? Ian: to have your beautiful eyes stare into mine from a cross the dinner table on friday night.... so how about it? Me: Is this you asking me out on a date? Ian: that it is (shyly) Me: well, i don't know... Ian: oh quit playing hard to get you know you want to... you in for quite a treat babe... i'll treat you like a queen Me: well in that case I can't resist...yes. Ian: oh come on babe you know thats not all you can't resist(winks) Me: whispers: ok your so damn sexy.... now get to work. On Friday at work we couldn't stop thinkin about later that night. I mean ian was sending his regular flirtous emails: i can't wait to see you tonight hun. When I came home from work he was all that was on my mind until andrew phoned and asked me to the movies... i didn't quite understand why cause ever since we kissed he is ignoring but anyway i basically told him that i was moving on and he should to. then came the intracation.... moving on? with who? don't you love me? I addmit a part of me still loves him and wants but i need to move on. Thanks to my friend Kayt for helping me to see that. I love ya Gurl... he'll never hurt me again cause when i hung up the phone that night... i felt free. that chapter of my life ended. 6 30 came pretty quick and I met IAN at the Pizza Factory my fav I might add. He was lookin sexy as hell.... oh man! and such a gentleman he held the door. thats big for me. We had good convo about everything under sun. MIGHT I ADD HE GAVE ME A single ROSE!!!!! so romantic.... sigh.... so ya it was a beautiful night but hey no kiss. Meh.... i'd rather his hand anyway.... take it slow.... leave something up to the imagination... and believe me its on my mind.... sigh LOL! i can't wait till our next DATE. then my sis kat came for the weekend. what a blast! we had a chocolate bar hand jobbing.... oh henrys rock.... funny as hell weekend. I love Kat Yesterday we saw without a paddle. it was fuckin funny and omg dax and matt willard soooooooooooooo hot man. I want a dax and matt sandwitch lol. Ok, my sis was a bit annoying though she kept on commenting about glen calling me a glen lover but hey shes my sis thats her job right? She was really upset we didn't go shopping she made a comment about seeing shannon and russell again at mall... i don't know she scares me sometimes don't ask lol. But she seems to like shannon and russell or all my friends for that matter which is cool cause i love them too. but it was nice to see her again man i missed her. the whole weekend/last few days have been awesome. thanks for the rocking times kat and ian.... many more to come... i hope Wow what a weekend!, Danni

A Night of New Beginnings

Omg!!!! Last Night was the best night of my life in a long while....Damn it why do all the good things happen after I write my last journal LMAO!! S'all good!!! Anyway, last night my mom and I talked for like 4 hours about everything under the sun. Then those words I waited for...I finally heard...

I LOVE YOU

she said it and she said that despite all our problems I was the best daughter she could have asked for. I was so happy... I cried. Then she told me she was crying too cause she missed me alot. Omg I got my old mom back!!! She is doing so well... she discovered a new talent... drawing! I'm kinda proud of her... wow I'd never thought I say that again!!! She hasn't invited me back to Norwood for a visit yet but she will.... give her time... give us time.. CLEAN SLATES ROCK!!! LMAO!!! The good stuff didn't stop there. My brothers friend T bone was over.... I mean don't get me wrong he's me friend too. Obvivously.... we dated awhile back man I loved that kid and always will. But ya, him and my brother were jamming and they played our song - mine and Andrews thats t bone. The song is called smile he wrote it for me... but its his smile that makes the earth stand still... not mine. We were pretty flirtious last night(wink).... then the monment came he kissed me. There was some tongue too lol!! We've kissed before but it felt like our first time. I was floating on a cloud. Damn it!! why does the kid have to be 15. Man, my dad won't let be date him... too young bullshit. WE WERE SO HAPPY!!! Then my dad didn't appove so we had to break it off oh my god... oh well what he doesn't know won't hear him Omg!! i sound like i want him back. I don't know we'll see but for now i'm just having fun... OH YA!!! fun is good. I talked to Glen last night too. I was a little awkward but I think i'm ready to start new... AS JUST HIS FRIEND. Well, i have to get to work and may be busty tonight so I don't know if i'll be writing later... i will try though. Cause life is so fuckin awesome!!

Floating,

Danni

Today was....

A Day of Reflection

I reflected upon all the shit that's been bothering me and realized its not up to someone else to fix my problems... it's up to me. I had a talked with my girl Jenny later on last night she reminded me that I have to stay positive despite everything. She reminded me that there are people who love me and look up to me.I can't and I won't sweat the small stuff anymore. I tried to see the good side of all my problems and here's what I found...

1. MY REALATIONSHIP WITH MY MOM - Wow!!!! Good news... my mom actually called last night. We had an awesome convo. I mean she actually asked how I was doing and shit... i was blown away. We both said sorry from all the lies, rejections etc. I think we have a new start.... a clean slate! and i'm so happy. I mean I do anything to have my mom back in my life. Somewhere inside... I miss her alot. She needs to kmow that...ill tell her overtime.

2. MY DAD AND BRO - I realized that their drinking and smoking is not my falut. I need to let them know I'm here for them despite everything... I LOVE THEM!!!

3. COLLEGE - So what the college screwed up... I'm still goin in January . I thought today that I would volenteer my time to Easter Seals again. Those kids need someone... man seein a smile on their faces would make me feel so happy. I phoned the society they said that they'd be honoured. SO I GOT A JOB!!!!

 4. GUYS- Man... didn't even think about Glen today!!! Making progress!! No actually its because my brother's friend T bone was over. He's a cutie!! He smile oh man it makes me melt inside.....we'll see (wink) LMAO!!

Man I am so thankful for all I have right now that I'm grining for ear to ear. I mean I have great friends one of them being Glen and omg Shannon... today was was like so supportive. She said she would do anything for me... means alot. I'm thankful for our new found friendship... I love that gurl!!! I LOVE EVERYTHING RIGHT NOW!!! no more lookung a found.................................

HOPE

Positive,

Danni

I'm back.... then my dad came home piss ass drunk and high at 2 am and was saying how he regreted me moving here... that i was too much work. I feel like a damn obligation to him. But, on the other hand I know its the booze talking but it fuckin bothers me when he washin his problems away with booze. I told him that the other day and he swore he would quit... but then that night... same old shit. Man, it hurts me inside to hear him say that he doesn't want me here  and it also destroys me to know that my dad is influencing Tyler, my seventeen year old bro to drink and smoke drugs. It effecting Ty to because he takes advil 4 times a day due to headaches and he can't sing anymore. My bro was a lead singer in a band but had to quit because of numberous sore throats due to pot smoking. It hurts to see my brother throw away his dream like that. I just wish my dad couldn't find happiness and stop all this shit... it fucked up. I mean I know he's depressed cause Barb his girlfriend left and my mom is always bitching at him saying he not a good enough father... but hey i love him and hate to see him like this. He needs help... him and Tyler both but I can't give it to them. IT PISSES ME OFF!!! Fuck, so instead I have to listen to them put me down... won't someone consider my feelings for once. That night I cried to sleep because of all this shit and because I couldn't get Glen off my mind. Man, I love him it hurts so much that I can't have something I want so bad. DOES ANY1 FUCKIN WANT ME... LIKE WHAT THE FUCK? So then I woke up this morning excited as hell cause today was going to be my first day at Fleming but they called and said they weren't ready in terms of my personal care needs. WELL, I'd like to know what the fuck they were doing since last fall. They knew then that I was coming... they had lots of time to get off theier lazy asses and set care up BUT NO!!! God dammit, they stuck me on the side line due to my special needs... too much work again...I guess... well fuck them do they not know how hard it was for me to apply. They are remind me of my teachers at Norwood... everything was a fight with them. I AM SICK OF FIGHTING FOR EVERYTHING I WANT AND NEED!!!!! I just want to break down and cry. So ya, anyway, they told me that I'm starting in January. Well, what in the hell I'm a suppose to do until then HUH YOU FUCKIN BASTARDS. Then for the rest of the day...I couldn't stop thinking of Glen. Everything reminds me of him. I playing the song Sad Song by Oasis and started to cry. I  imagined him singing it with that sexy voice of his.. i know its one of our favs and then I was torn apart. Man, i don't know if I'll forget him in a crush kinda way ever. OH, my ex Matt wants me back too.. i see what happens once Glen is off my mind. But should I take hom back... he cheated on my ass?? I'm so confused and scared to love again. Fuck i'm pissing myself off!! Alot of my friends are trying to get me to stay positive right now... but I can't find away. Man, they are good friends but I don't really want to talk to them right now. I feel bad cause they are my friends and all. Theres one person I would love to talk to... he always knows the right things to say to make me feel better...GLEN!! but I can't bring myself to talk to him. I don't know why!! I guess I'm scared that if I talk to him right now, he'll never ecaspe my mind. I have to forget these feelings... damn it I HAVE TO!! But is this right to push him away and ignore him like this. Will it I affect our friendship forever??? I pray to god not. I DON'T KNOW ANYMORE....THINGS ARE MESSED UP!!!! Won't someone help me get my life back in order and some what normal...??? 

Tear shedding,
Danni
